summary:
Small mod adding Bis, a Khajiit, and Dustan, a Nord. They are both followers.
Bis can be found in Gurdur's house in Riverwood.
Dustan, the Bannered Mare.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]First of all[/b]:[/u] I am [b]NOT [/b]going to start on first mod excuse. Any mod, first or not can be great. I'll say this instead: [b]Basic and buggy! You were warned!

Bis: [/b] Bis is a Khajiit follower found in the house of Gerdur. He only has pants on his legs. He is Essential and is gear-less. That's all.

[u]Dustyn: [/u]Dustyn is a Brown-Haired Nord found in the Bannered Mare. He has arrows on him and wears Hide armor. He too is Essential. That's all for him.

[u]IT MAY NEED PRETTY FACES MOD[/u] It has worked with/without. ﻿http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?
author: Billy
